Configuration.Name: L1=L2=6m_central_apx12p5
Configuration.SetupScript: config.wavelength = 5 config.wavelength_spread = 0.1 config.det = 5200 config.det_offset = 0 config.srce = 180 config.guide = 'g6' config.apx = -98 config.bs = 2 config.beamcenterx = 100.17 config.beamcenterz = 96.11 config.drive()
